pages.title: Gemstone Lamps
pages.text: $(italic)When you set foot in the first geode, you were already met with pleasant light. With your knowledge, it's easy to amplify this light to create fancy lamps.$()

Gemstone Glass comes in all the colors of gemstones available to you. Both $(l:decoration/block_variants)Chiseled Calcite$() and $(l:decoration/block_variants)Chiseled Basalt$() can be used as a base.
